item.title: About
item.description: I am El Moustatpha, a passionate student of Statistics and Data Engineering. I have been studying at Ecole Superieure Polytechniques de Nouakchott since 2021 . Having completed a preparatory class at Institut Preparatoire aux Grandes Ecoles dâ€™Ingenieurs Nouakchott, I have gained a strong foundation to handle complex analytical challenges. My academic journey is supported by significant professional experience. In terms of technical skills, I have a strong understanding of statistical concepts and methods.

item.title: Projects
item.description: Nov. 2022 - May 2023 Industrial Project in Enterprise Link to heading Mauritanian Institute of Oceanographic Research and Fisheries (IMROP) Link to heading The objective was to study the relationships between different variables and work on a model to predict the total catches of artisanal and coastal fishing. March 2023 Data Challenge Link to heading Data Turing Link to heading The objective was to build a predictive model capable of predicting the probability of a student passing the Mauritanian Baccalaureate examination.
